arts.ttl: FPL notes: Gabriel injury latest + Vardy inspires Leicester
arts.sum: We look back on Fulham 1-1 Arsenal and Leicester 2-2 Brighton The post FPL notes: Gabriel injury latest + Vardy inspires Leicester appeared first on Best FPL Tips, Advice, Team News, Picks, and Statistics from Fantasy Football Scout.

arts.ttl: Leicester fight back from two goals down to draw against Brighton
arts.sum: The result leaves Leicester 16th in the table, five points above the relegation zone and unbeaten in two matches under new manager Van Nistelrooy. Leicester City scored two late goals to come back from 2-0 down and draw 2-2 with Brighton & Hove Albion .

arts.ttl: Leicester City 2-2 Brighton highlights and reaction after De Cordova-Reid nets late equaliser
arts.sum: The performance of the whole team that put him in position. That’s why, as a team, we put him in the position there, and that’s where we want to put players who can make the difference for us.

arts.ttl: Jamie Vardy's 'brilliant moment' leaves Ruud van Nistelrooy pondering what he'd have done
arts.sum: Van Nistelrooy felt the performance on Sunday was better than the one that earned three points against West Ham. Ruud van Nistelrooy hailed Jamie Vardy’s brilliance to set up Leicester City’s last-gasp equaliser against Brighton – with the manager unsure he’d have shown the same selflessness.

arts.ttl: Brighton need to be 'more mature' - Hurzeler
arts.sum: Brighton boss Fabian Hurzeler says his side need to be "more mature" after they allowed Leicester to score two late goals to draw the game.

arts.ttl: Van Nistelrooy praises Foxes for 'digging deep' after comeback
arts.sum: Leicester's new boss Ruud van Nistelrooy praises his squad's fighting spirit after a stunning comeback in an 2-2 draw with Brighton.

arts.ttl: Ruud van Nistelrooy hails talisman Jamie Vardy after comeback draw with Brighton
arts.sum: Vardy scored one and made the other.
